title: Adele Finally Returns with "Hello" Music Video
text: Adele Teases Fans With New Music in TV Ad 00:46 Could it finally be time for some new Adele music? It's been a long four years since her last album and the singer appears to have teased British television viewers with a snippet of new music, broadcasted during an ad break on prime-time TV. The 30-second ad shown Sunday evening during TV talent... Recent related news The Grammy-winning songstress is providing a sneak peek at her upcoming album, watch the video here CBS News 1 hour ago - Front Page Adele is greeting fans with her first new single in three years. Pitchfork 6 hours ago - Entertainment The singer goes back to a house filled with memories of her and her ex in the dramatic video for the first single off her new album '25'.
